text: Yuvan Raghupathy, runner-up of the @Vijaybhoomi_Uni's #DiscoveryChallenge on the topic, The #Pandemic: #COVID19 #Vaccine Rollout, from @SISIBSchool talks about how it was exciting to grapple with the numerous challenges and thinking about innovative ways to resolve them. https://t.co/cCw7lxUdo0
